website_summaries.verdict: New Balance has a lot to offer in the sports arena, but its release of the Striker gives golfers an excellent option. This shoe serves as the next go-to product. It provides the comfort needed to last throughout the entire round of walking, traction for a no-slip swing, and water protection for morning dew and rain. Golfers are generally not surprised that the American brand that produces golf shoes would produce equally great golf shoes.
pros: A high number of testers declare that the New Balance Striker is an extremely comfortable product
Plenty of users are delighted that the spikes provide considerable slippage
It gives more than specific traction on wet, rainy, and soggy environments, according to many reviewers
It also backs into shape after getting damp
Several consumers cannot deny that they are enjoying the compliments that they receive from this New Balance golf shoe’s style
Some feel pleased that no matter how dirty this New Balance golf shoe is, it’s easy to clean
Using a spray bottle and water is enough to restore its brand new look
A couple of testers are fans of this spiked shoe's structure because it provides a plethora of support
cons: One golfer feels disappointed that despite the PW-1 last that is supposed to have a wide toe box, it still feels narrow across the foot
A small number of commenters are bothered that this shoe could use a softer insole

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes I have worn. I play 4 times a week and usually walk. I rotate through 3 pairs of shoes and these have held up well and feel like bedroom slippers. I have a wide foot and bought the Wide version, which is a 2E.
customer_reviews.author: PeterS

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Men's Striker Golf Shoe Most Comfortable Ever
customer_reviews.text: I play golf three times per week and walk (6 miles) most of the time. A comfortable golf shoe is a must. I have a pair of NB-2400 golf shoes and there are very comfortable so I tried the new NB-Striker and it is just as comfortable or better. I tossed out my Ecco Golf shoes as New Balance is definitely the most comfortable and best for walking. My shoe size is 9.5 Medium and went up 1/2 size to 10 Medium and they fit like a glove!
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Solid shoe but replace the insole
customer_reviews.text: I play around 70 to 80 rounds a year. I walk and carry about 90% of the time. I bought this shoe to replace a previous New Balance model that was a very solid shoe. I generally go through a pair a year. This shoe is virtually identical. My only complaint is with the insole. Not sure what’s different but blistered my feet. But after I switched it out with an aftermarket insole I’ve had no problems. Comfortable and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof?
customer_reviews.text: This is second pair for my husband. He wore it yesterday in Seattle golf courses. It wasn’t raining but the ground was wet on some places. His socks were wet from toe to the middle on both feet after a round of golf. His other pair had no problem. Something must be wrong with this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Teena Kwon

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the most comfortable golf shoe I have worn.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect anyone to honor the 2 year waterproof guarantee
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were great for the first season, wore them for maybe 15 rounds of golf from June- October before putting them away (indoors) for the winter. The following spring, wore the shoes a couple times and immediately noticed that my feet were getting wet. After a couple more uses, my feet were soaked within the first few holes. Contacted New Balance twice, expecting them to honor the waterproof guarantee. Unfortunately, no such luck. They told me on both occasions that I should return the product to the retailer. Obviously, they won't stand by the guarantee, and of course Amazon won't do anything after 30 days. I've flagged the listing as fraudulent and hopefully people will avoid buying these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Biggrich

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes, and they are waterproof which is important to me since I play golf in the early am when there is lots of dew on the ground. Most important for me is that New Balance makes shoes in large sizes which other brands do not. They have great traction...I would say that they run about a half size large, and I wear a size 16 normally. I could probably get away with ordering a size 15 but I prefer to have a little extra room in my golf shoes. I just lace them up tighter.
customer_reviews.author: golfrad

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with the fit, comfort and waterproofing! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old golf shoes and my primary concern was comfort, followed closely by waterproofing. I am a large guy and need quality support if I'm going to make it through a round, which these very pleasantly deliver. Also, I often play in damp conditions and hate getting my socks wet. I have played two rounds with them, the first round it was actively raining the entire round and the ground was soaked. My socks were completely dry. 10/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Shoe for Walking Golfer
customer_reviews.text: I walk 40-70 times per year and have been an Ecco customer for a decade. When this NB went on sale for $100, I had to try them. Yes, they did run small as many have cited and had to send back for a half size larger and 2E wider. Wore them yesterday for the 1st time. Extremely comfortable, strong supportive base and very light. If the hold-up like Ecco's these are a steal
customer_reviews.author: Cajuknight

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just finished walking 18. Most comfortable golf shoes I’ve ever bought. Ordering another pair today Incase they stop making.
customer_reviews.author: g s papagianopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Fit as advertised, athletic shoe and normal toe box
customer_reviews.text: I;ve been searching for a new golf shoe and these seem to be spot on. The FJ's out there continue to get more narrow in the toe box, these are not, but I would say they are normal. The insert is removable so even if a bit snug with socks, you could replace it with another. Good job NB!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy experience
customer_reviews.text: I have used New Balance sneakers and golf shoes for years but this one is not a winner. The shoe seems fine, the size is smaller than normal, but there was some kind of brown material coming out of the shoe when I work it--not sure if it was glue or what else but it stained my sock and foot. Returning after one wearing.
customer_reviews.author: R. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: FEET GOT SOAKED! This shoe is advertised as "waterproof". I bought them and have had them for one season. But, after walking nine holes on a wet course, my socks and feet were absolutely soaked through. As much as I usually love NB for their wide fit, I cannot recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey S. Ganeles

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Upper Lip
customer_reviews.text: The size is excellent but the uppers are so stiff, the top of my foot was bruised for the first 3 times wearing this shoe. The laces are great and hold in wet weather. They are waterproof but if your socks get wet, they hold in the moisture inside the shoe so take them off as soon as you get home. Not what I would expect in a $100 golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: James W. Foster,  MD

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe until it blew apart after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for his birthday this past January. He loved them and said they were comfortable and perfectly waterproof. Yesterday (August) however the side blew out and now they’re neither. I’m reordering another pair and will try to get some recompense from New Balance. I’ll keep you updated.
customer_reviews.author: Susanb

customer_reviews.title: Be careful to ensure you order the right size. These shoes have replaceable spikes.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only played 18 holes in these shoes but found them to be comfortable and easy on the feet. I barely knew that I had them on, they were so light. I have wide feet and have had great success with the variety of New Balance sizes. I found these golf shoes To be great for width but just a bit short on length but still OK to use and I expect to Have them for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Davunt

customer_reviews.title: Top pad fell out
customer_reviews.text: Wore this shoe for 3 rounds of golf and after the third round, I found that the stitching for BOTH top pads had come out and the pads were loose. The only thing keeping them attached to the shoe was the laces. I am 40 years old and have had countless pairs of shoes. I have NEVER had something like this happen. This shoe construction is junk. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: chopperdave

customer_reviews.title: Serious quality defects.
customer_reviews.text: First NB shoes I bought that were made in China. Long time fan of NB but no more. Terrible quality: Tongue/flap on both shoes very poorly stitched. Left shoe ripped loose after about 5 wears and right shoe tongue/flap is almost completely ripped. Very disappointed. Not even 2 months old and 5 rounds of golf and already useless. Do not buy this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Golf Shoe for Walking
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for over 12 walking rounds now and I have to say they are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever owned. I have played several times in constant rain and my feet have stayed dry even after walking 6+ miles in soaking conditions. The shoes did not get tough or hard after drying out. The shoes provide excellent traction in dry or wet conditions. They clean very well and still look new.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not "standard" New Balance width IMO
customer_reviews.text: New Balance walking/running shoes typically are MUCH wider than other popular named brand shoes. While they're labeled a D width, I figured they'd fit like all of my other NB shoes. Unfortunately not the case with their golf shoes. They'll stretch a bit I'm sure, but probably not enough. Make sure you order WIDE or EXTRA WIDE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 more pair after the first one
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable golf shoe ever. I walk every round, about 7 miles, and my feet love these. This is neither here or there, but I would buy odor spray for any pair of golf shoes you'll use if you're consistently walking a golf course. Your car will thank you for that.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Drescher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Walked 18 the first time I wore them, and they are very comfortable and supportive. Went back to a spiked shoe after wearing spikeless (Pro SL) for 1.5 years and the spikes definitely provide better grip. Haven't tested the waterproof nature yet. I wear a 10 4E in NB tennis shoes and these fit perfectly in the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I broke these in walking two back to back, 18-hole rounds. Both courses were kind of short, about 6,500 yds each. The shoes are very comfortable and they really do feel more like running shoes than golf shoes. My feet were just a little sore after the first round. After a short break and a few beers I started my second round with no discomfort whatsoever. By the end of the round I was experiencing normal 36 hole fatigue, but my feet felt fine. It was a dry day so I can not attest to how they stand up to a wet course. Traction seemed fine. So far, very happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Waggle

customer_reviews.title: They are great but run a fill size smaller than regular New Balance Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear New Balances regularly, I wear both 880V7 and 880V8's and wear a 10 with those. ***The golf shoes run a full size too large.*** I got a 9 in these and they fit perfectly. They are a great structurally and provide a lot of support.
customer_reviews.author: SevenCentsVerno

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shoes with extra wide options are more difficult to find each year. NB has been my go to shoe for years as a baseball umpire so I tried these shoes. Haven't worn them in a round yet but tried them on and they are extremely comfortable. Looking forward to playing in them.
customer_reviews.author: mike t

customer_reviews.title: Terrible construction quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted only 6 months before the sole separated from the shoe. I am not rough on shoes and played golf ~2x per week, so not a heavy usage schedule. I will not buy another New Balance shoe based on this experience.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of the size you will need
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes are as comfortable as the previous pair i purchased. The main thing I like about new balance golf shoes and tennis shoes are the size options and how well they last. I don't mind looking down at any of my new balance shoes!
customer_reviews.author: liz stearns

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I have to update my review. My shoes are not waterproof. My feet got soaked yesterday morning and since it was only 45° they got cold also. I have been a loyal customer of New Balance shoes but this my second pair of NB golf shoes that have left me very disappointed. Now I have to but other shoes. These were $95 and I dont know about you but I cant afford to keep buying shoes every few months.
customer_reviews.author: SFCD

customer_reviews.title: Returned - Poor quality insole caused discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Most shoes have an insole that covers the entire bottom of the shoe, even wrapping slightly up the sides. These have a cheaply made insole with a gap between the insole and sides of the shoe. I first thought my socks had bunched up under my feet, then realized that is just the result of poor construction! Returned and not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable and stable
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. They are the only company I could find that make their shoes in a wide fit. I took a flyer and bought them w/out having ever tried on a pair and they fit great! Played my first round in them yesterday and they were extremely comfortable and stable.
customer_reviews.author: BFW

customer_reviews.title: Shoe runs small
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality shoe and I was excited to receive;however, the shoe runs small and if used by avid golfers they would be sorry to walk a full game in these shoes. I am just starting and noticed the size right out of the box. I will order another pair but a larger size than my normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable and have held up pretty good so far - even in rainy weather. I am curious as to how hot my feet will be in the middle of summer. So far, they seem to be a good value for the $$
customer_reviews.author: lilbuck51

customer_reviews.title: New Balance golf shoes are quality built.
customer_reviews.text: Well built . NB products are pretty good for looks and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Petercdavis

customer_reviews.title: Order a size bigger
customer_reviews.text: They fit ok, should have gotten a 14 wide. Just a little tight and short. But all and all a great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf shoe, ensure right size
customer_reviews.text: Love New Balance for my running shoes so tried this to see if I could get the same wide and supported shoe for golf. Bought my normal size 10W but they were too small both in width and length. Made a very easy exchange via Amazon exchanging it for a 10.5 X-wide. They are absolutely perfect. Much better arch support then other golf shoes but I would only rank it as moderate support.
customer_reviews.author: GtheB

customer_reviews.title: Too early to tell is waterproof, just got them
customer_reviews.text: Received and have worn them three times. Not sure if waterproof or not as I have yet to golf in foul weather. Fall is here so time will tell
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits wide feet!!
customer_reviews.text: If you have wide feet like me, these are amazing golf shoes! It's so nice to find golf shoes that dont jam the inside of my toe on huge drives!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected. Perfect golf shoe, all the features you want without the inflated price tag. High quality and exceptional value
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfy to wear and feel nice to walk in (hence two stars) But they are not waterproof. A month in while playing on a dewy course my foot was soaked (not sure if mine was defective or not). Not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, I’ve had lots of golf shoes over the years and this one is very comfortable for my 13 EEE size foot.Good quality, would by again
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Blake

customer_reviews.title: Perform as described.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box walked 18 holes, very impressed with how comfortable they are, and keep my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: mwilly

customer_reviews.title: Fit and comfort are great however the quality is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: On both shoes the tongue was not sewn in well and has completely torn out of the shoes. And Amazon does not allow returns even when I just got them in May. I am going to my local Pro Shop where I will pay a little more but at least have good service!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, terrible stitching on shoe tongues.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit fine and was very nice, BOTH tongues detached with cheap stitching after just 2 wears on one shoe and 5 on the other shoe. I play golf 2X a week and go and hit range balls 1 more day a week. They did not last very long. The shoes are fine and I will still wear them but now I have to adjust a loose unattached tongue which is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf shoe. I have wide feet and it is difficult to find golf shoes wide enough for my feet. Fit is comparable to other New Balance athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tomfrom Homewood

customer_reviews.title: Fits like you'd expect a New Balance Shoe to fit
customer_reviews.text: just remember that this will feel a little snug when you first get them. I bought my usual size with New Balance and after wearing them for 30 mins, they felt just fine... nice shoes
customer_reviews.author: D. Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable stylish and water proof.
customer_reviews.text: These New Balanced shoes are the most comfortable golf shoes I have worn. They fit well, look good, and they keep my feet dry. I play twice a week. I like to play early. The courses are always wet early in the morning. My feet have not been wet one time with these shoes. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Steve'y

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable with my wide feet
customer_reviews.text: A little more than I wanted to pay as I am not really a very avid or good golfer but wanted to see if I was missing anything since I have always worn sneakers. Satisfied - they fit, they are comfortable, good to go.....
customer_reviews.author: Engineer John

customer_reviews.title: New Balance golf shoes are comfortable and good for people with wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have very wide feet. These are the best fitting golf shoes I have found. They are comfortable, full leather, waterproof, and have ground-gripping Champ cleats. I recommend them to anybody who is looking for a comfortable golf shoe. The price was good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pegram

customer_reviews.title: great shoe for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable once you get the right size...........took me 3 times, seems like NB shoes are running a little smaller than they used to, I had to order a half size up than I used to.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: Great golf shoes that fit perfectly out of the box and needed no break in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Wore these golf shoes 10 or 12 times and they collapsed and rolled over to the outside for both left and right shoes. Terrible golf shoes
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Was great until....
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this shoe, until the tongue ripped out. He wasn’t pulling hard and he was quit shocked. So sad since he has only worn them about 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Albin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe overall time will tell only worn them 5 times now but have not had any problems
customer_reviews.author: Phhunter

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for waterproof as they promote, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: After wearing a couple of months in the morning dew, they totally are not waterproof! Wet feet every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jane L.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They fit as expected and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim L. Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to a 4E
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an extra wide shoe, this it not it. Fits like a D at best.
customer_reviews.author: MAUREEN APPLEBY

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied, no wetness and good comfort
customer_reviews.text: more than I wanted to spend but they are an excellent shoe
customer_reviews.author: Jody L Gerding

customer_reviews.title: Looking good.
customer_reviews.text: Like the looks. We'll wait to see how waterproof they are.
customer_reviews.author: Peter D Farmer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I wear an AFO on my left foot/leg. I am grateful for comfort of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but wet
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable, I bought the blue and the white. Pretty much the most comfortable shoe I’ve bought. But the first time I played in some wet conditions with both shoes, they both were more wet than the other “water resistant” shoes I’ve had in the past!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t comment on the feel and use of this product as it runs so small that I could not get it on my foot. I wear a 13, which is what arrived. It was actually an 11.5 when checked with a sizing tool. I had to give them away to a friend’s son so they wouldn’t go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: Collin

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: Was merely looking for shoe that repelled water better. These do. Also, quite comfortable. I don't think you'll be disappointed with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe for walking
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was really comfortable right out of the box. Walked 18 holes 3 times since purchasing. No issues at all. Great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very good quality. Ordered wide size first, New Balance run normal to large, so you do not need to order wide, had to send originals back because I was swimming in them. Normal 10.5 fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Denison

customer_reviews.title: Great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, well made, true fit. Waterproofing excellent- wore in extreme conditions 3 time so far, kept my feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: wacoMick

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: They look great, fit well and are very comfortable. I don’t believe they’re great quality. They seem like he’ll need new golf shoes again next spring. They were very inexpensive though so that balances out.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: These shoes claimed to be waterproof, but I just wore them to play an early morning round and my feet were soaked. It hasn't even rained that much recently, it was just the morning dew. Very disappointed. I would like to return them, but there's no option for that now.
customer_reviews.author: Amrit P. Sekhon

customer_reviews.title: Six weeks and the material broke down in the heel
customer_reviews.text: Defective and will not allow a return. very bad business!!!
customer_reviews.author: BILDEN

customer_reviews.title: Good Golf Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Size was a little smaller that expected, but still worked for me. Sizing is not the same as New Balance athletic shoes. Wore out of the box and felt great for 27 holes of golf. Very good grip and comfort. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Aderholt

customer_reviews.title: Sole is separating from the leather.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve played 3 rounds in these shoes and the sole is separating from the leather. I’ve favorited new balance for their comfort and previous satisfaction so this is disappointing. Would like to have them replaced but apparently you only have 60 days and have to be unworn.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly comfortable golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes grip very well and stay planted throughout your swing. They are incredibly comfortable because they have a very thick foam cushion insert. I hope the cushion doesn't flatten over time.
customer_reviews.author: Easy to please...

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, very comfortable. Best Golf shoe I own... Priced reasonable. It is hard to get a shoe in a wide width.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.text: I only used 7 times for golf, and I found half of sole of left shoe split and came out. I was so embarrassed in middle of golf round. I returned to Amazon which I bought from but got refund only portion of what I paid. This is totally manufacture material defect.
customer_reviews.author: soon h. kim

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've only played 1 round with these shoes and have to say they're extremely comfortable. They are lightweight and waterproof, no wet socks at the end of an early morning round.
customer_reviews.author: JayG

customer_reviews.title: good shoe
customer_reviews.text: good shoes, they fit as expected and have no issues with them
customer_reviews.author: in search of a good book

customer_reviews.title: Not Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit fine and were comfortable, but they are not waterproof at all. I have had them for less than six months and they leak like a sieve. When I play on a dewy morning, when I am done my feet are soaking wet.
customer_reviews.author: James Gano

customer_reviews.title: Shoe size must be correct with the socks you intend to wear.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were not that comfortable when I first put them on but within an hour they felt fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barrier than the NB Walker
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a bit more narrow than the 4E New Balance walkers I own. Maybe a half size up would help. Like the style and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Howl Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have played about 15-20 rounds in these, comfortable shoe but I bought these because they said waterproof. They were for about the first month of use then wet socks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan VanZant

customer_reviews.title: The perfect xtra wide golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoe. Fits perfectly with extra wide availability. Comfort contour especially the sole inside. Good cushioning. Water proof and the soft spikes give great traction. And very cool looking too. Black n red. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful for this!

customer_reviews.title: The sizes vary
customer_reviews.text: I had the exact same pair Of golf shoes Purchased a second pair And the size was different Had to return the 2nd pair
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Inside disintegrated
customer_reviews.text: Inside of both shoes disintegrated at the heels after two months. Have worn New Balance many times before with good results but not this time with this model. New Balance Men's Striker Waterproof Spiked Comfort Golf Shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, and comfort, right out of the box. No 'breaking-in' period. Sized just right.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice, actual trash
customer_reviews.text: After not even twenty times wearing these the tongue completely came out of the shoe. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up in use.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fitting comfortable golf shoe. However, after 10 rounds of golf right shoe sole is separating from shoe at the front, just 1 month beyond the return window. ? Very disappointed with New Balance as I really liked these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: love

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable, dry shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, very comfortable. Rained first day I used them, totally dry. I went wide width, because golf shoes seem to run narrow, perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: M.Soiney

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I loved them right out of the box. One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought the first pair and tongue rip out within 2 weeks, Got a replacement from Amazon. After 3 weeks same thing, Past the return date by 1 day. No help from New Balance.
customer_reviews.author: kim parshall

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, and these shoes fit great! True to size. I wear a size 11.5EE New Balance tennis shoe, so ordered the same size in their golf shoe. Fits perfect, and looks great! Very well done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent New Balance Golf Shoe for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I have worn NB sneakers for years so was really pleased that they released a golf shoe. Just as comfortable as the sneakers, I have a wide foot and these are a joy to walk around the course in.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Zdanowicz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friend and he said they are extremely comfortable to play in and fit very well.
customer_reviews.author: HLR

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They fit very well and they look good. I'm not sure that they have improved my game, but I figure that part is up to me...
customer_reviews.author: Guy Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband since he has had good experience with New Balance, not being able to try on in the store. Worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie E Smith

customer_reviews.title: leaked and came apart
customer_reviews.text: i play mornings, early mornings, 3 days a week, most weeks. i love this shoe but it is coming apart up front and it is not as water proof as they claim. i am trying to return them, i'll keep you posted
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Style and fit
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these shoes. I got them for my son. He is a big man child. He loved them. Said they looked sharp and fit nicely! No more slipping on the wet green grass. They came in a timely manner too!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: So far everything is perfect. Being a new balance product they usually have good standards
customer_reviews.author: lisa freedman

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe for it's waterproof feature. It is a little too big, but anything smaller would be too tight.
customer_reviews.author: David Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sizing. I have a wide foot and wear orthotics so the 4E width is perfect. Shoes are light as a feather so you barely know you have them on. And they look good too.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon M Sager

customer_reviews.title: New Balance Does it AGAIN!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are so comfortable, just like all New Balance shoes. More than happy with my order. Product is even better than pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Loncs

customer_reviews.title: Giving as a Christmas gift?
customer_reviews.text: Giving as a Christmas gift. So I can’t rate this?
customer_reviews.author: NC

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Striker Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: Play the fairways in lasting comfort with the men’s striker golf shoe. An innovative exoskeleton TPU outsole is designed to move naturally with your foot. A waterproof microfiber leather upper with fantom technology helps you stay dry and provides ultralight support. A REVlite midsole gives outstanding responsiveness and cushioning so you can fully concentrates on your next shot. Featuring champ slim-lok zarma tour® replaceable cleats.
feature_bullets: Waterproof microfiber leather upper with ultralight FantomFit support
Exoskeleton TPU outsole designed to move with the natural motion of your foot
REVlite 10mm drop midsole provides lightweight cushioning & premium responsiveness
